description: Through my experience in the management of human relations and my cartesian mind, I am able to carry out all kind of projects to completion. My human skills, combined with my technicality will mark me as a very good element within your project/company.
Specialized in front end development, I have HTML, CSS and vanilla Javascript skills. I use the React library as well as the Sass pre-processor in priority.
The problem solving component being the very reason of my interest in development, my appetite and preference are therefore in the writing of functions to answer particular needs.
In addition to my front-end skills, I am also competent on the MERN stack thanks to my training as a Web Developer at OpenClassrooms.
